title: is riot ever going to fix this shit or should we just stop supporting them?

embed.description: watch the video and you tell me what you think

body:
getting over it. 

match making is fucked

intentional feeders not being punished

junglers refusing to help not being punished

afkers just getting a 5min waiting time

client crashing

no responses from support 

but now they want all these sponsors XD LMFAO poor Drake and THE ROCK having their names put onto this shitty label/company for nothing.
